text: Accumulator containers must be attached to the major structure of the chassis by 8 mm Metric Grade 8.8 (5/16 inch Grade 5) fasteners, or stronger.

answer_options.answer_text: Accumulators less than 20 kg must use a minimum of 4 fasteners
Accumulators more than 40 kg and greater must use a minimum of 12 fasteners
Accumulators more than 20 kg and less than 30 kg must use a minimum of 8 fasteners
Accumulators more than 30 kg and less than 40 kg must use a minimum of 10 fasteners

answers.answer_text: Accumulators less than 20 kg must use a minimum of 4 fasteners
Accumulators more than 40 kg and greater must use a minimum of 12 fasteners
Accumulators more than 20 kg and less than 30 kg must use a minimum of 8 fasteners
Accumulators more than 30 kg and less than 40 kg must use a minimum of 10 fasteners
